overview:
## Overview

Use this intent to open both dynamic items such as [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity] and static items such as an [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEnum] with voice commands; for example, “Open ‘Vacation Ideas’” or “Open bookmarks”.

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/appintents/openintent
crawled: 2025-12-05T15:13:04Z

# OpenIntent

**Protocol**

Open the associated item.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol OpenIntent : SystemIntent
```

## Overview

Use this intent to open both dynamic items such as [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEntity] and static items such as an [doc://com.apple.AppIntents/documentation/AppIntents/AppEnum] with voice commands; for example, “Open ‘Vacation Ideas’” or “Open bookmarks”.

## Associated Types

- **Value**

## Instance Properties

- **target**

## Actions

- **AppIntent**: An interface for providing an app-specific capability that people invoke from system experiences like Siri and the Shortcuts app.
- **AudioPlaybackIntent**: An App Intent that plays, pauses, or otherwise modifies audio playback state when it executes.
- **AudioRecordingIntent**: An app intent that starts, stops or otherwise modifies audio recording state.
- **AudioStartingIntent**: An App Intent that plays, pauses, or otherwise modifies audio playback state when it executes.
- **CameraCaptureIntent**: Designates intent that will launch an activity that uses device’s camera to capture photos or videos. Marking your intent with this protocol makes it available as a possible action for Camera quick action.
- **DeleteIntent**: Delete the associated entity(s).
- **DeprecatedAppIntent**: An app intent that marks an action as deprecated and informs people which action to use instead.
- **ForegroundContinuableIntent**: A protocol you use for app intents which begin their work with the app in the background but may request to continue in the foreground.
- **OpenURLIntent**: An intent that opens a universal link.
- **PlayVideoIntent**: An intent that looks for videos based on a search term, then plays the content.
- **ProgressReportingIntent**: An intent that reports progress to the system during its execution
- **PushToTalkTransmissionIntent**: An intent that begins or ends an audio transmission with the Push to Talk framework.
- **URLRepresentableIntent**: An app intent with a URL representation.
- **SetValueIntent**: An intent that contains a value which can be set.
- **ShowInAppSearchResultsIntent**: An app intent that takes a person to search results for a specified search term.

## Inherits From

- AppIntent
- PersistentlyIdentifiable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SystemIntent
